You call upon your patron's power to better uncover secrets.

When you Cast the Spell, the target can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}.

The target is temporarily immune to discern secrets for 1 minute.

Heightened (5th) You can target two creatures instead of one.
